title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, it is observed that the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Create two projects P1 and P2. 2. Select project P2. 3. Attempt to close project P2.
